Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! All the news about New Horizons and Pluto made me pick up this awesome game again. And it's even better than I remember.

After a good amount of time in sandbox mode in earlier alpha versions, I'm trying my best now at career mode. It's fantastic. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

So hi everyone & happy kerbaling! See ya.
See you in orbit my friend!

Yeah, exciting times with New Horizons. Makes me realize just how hard space really is, and excited that I have a game that makes it a bit easier and puts it at my fingertips.

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
